content: crochet a daisy flower in **30 minutes** with this free quick & easy beginner friendly pattern just **5 rounds** it s great for using up **yarn scraps** because you only need small amounts of **2 colours** they make **cute coasters** but you can also use them as **appliqués** to attach to other crochet projects while worsted/aran yarn is suggested you can **use any yarn** using the yarn s recommended hook size will give you a looser floppier flower so if you want to make coasters go down 1-2 hook sizes for a firmer flower that works better
